WebSockets offer an interesting alternative to XmlHttpRequest, especially when it comes to holding connections – something which can only be accomplished with very expensive hacks when using XHR.
„WebSocket is a technology providing for bi-directional, full-duplex communications channels, over a single Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket.“
From: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebSocket
Hint: Adrian gave a talk about WebSockets.
It might be worthwhile to enhance io.rest.Resource with WebSockets capability.
